title: Kilo Code CLI Configuration
description: Configuration file for Kilo Code CLI

provider.description: ID of the currently selected provider

autoApproval.description: Auto approval configuration for CLI operations

read.description: Auto approval settings for read operations

write.description: Auto approval settings for write operations

protected.description: Auto approve writes to protected files

browser.description: Auto approval settings for browser operations

retry.description: Auto approval settings for retry operations

delay.description: Delay in seconds before auto-approving retry

mcp.description: Auto approval settings for MCP operations

mode.description: Auto approval settings for mode switching

subtasks.description: Auto approval settings for subtask creation

execute.description: Auto approval settings for command execution

allowed.description: List of allowed commands (empty means all allowed)

question.description: Auto approval settings for followup questions

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds before auto-approving question

todo.description: Auto approval settings for todo list updates

maxRequests.description: Maximum number of auto-approved requests (null for unlimited)

maxCost.description: Maximum cost for auto-approved requests (null for unlimited)

id.description: Unique identifier for this provider configuration

kilocodeTesterWarningsDisabledUntil.description: Timestamp until which tester warnings are disabled

anthropicBaseUrl.description: Custom base URL for Anthropic API requests

anthropicUseAuthToken.description: Use authentication token instead of API key

openAiNativeServiceTier.description: OpenAI service tier for request prioritization and latency optimization. 'auto' lets OpenAI choose the best tier, 'default' uses standard processing, 'flex' offers cost-optimized processing with variable latency, and 'priority' provides the fastest processing with higher priority.

openRouterSpecificProvider.description: Specific OpenRouter provider to use for routing requests

openRouterUseMiddleOutTransform.description: Enable middle-out transform for optimized request routing

openRouterProviderSort.description: OpenRouter provider sorting preference for model selection

openRouterZdr.description: Enable OpenRouter Zero Data Retention for enhanced privacy

awsUsePromptCache.description: Enable prompt caching to reduce costs and latency for repeated prompts

awsProfile.description: AWS profile name from credentials file

awsUseProfile.description: Use AWS profile from credentials file instead of access keys

awsApiKey.description: AWS API key for alternative authentication

awsUseApiKey.description: Use API key authentication instead of access keys

awsCustomArn.description: Custom ARN for cross-account or custom model access

awsModelContextWindow.description: Override the model's default context window size

awsBedrock1MContext.description: Enable 1M token context window support for compatible models

enableUrlContext.description: Allows the model to access and process URLs in prompts

enableGrounding.description: Enables Google Search grounding for factual responses

enableUrlContext.description: Allows the model to access and process URLs in prompts

enableGrounding.description: Enables Google Search grounding for factual responses

claudeCodeMaxOutputTokens.description: Maximum output tokens for Claude Code

ollamaNumCtx.description: Context window size for Ollama models. Controls the maximum number of tokens the model can process at once. Common values: 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384, 32768. Higher values allow processing longer conversations but require more memory.

lmStudioDraftModelId.description: Draft model ID for speculative decoding. This smaller, faster model generates initial predictions that are verified by the main model, potentially improving inference speed.

lmStudioSpeculativeDecodingEnabled.description: Enable speculative decoding for faster inference. When enabled with a draft model, uses a two-stage generation process where a smaller model proposes tokens that are verified by the main model.

openAiBaseUrl.description: Custom base URL for OpenAI API requests

openAiLegacyFormat.description: Use legacy API format for compatibility with older OpenAI API versions

openAiR1FormatEnabled.description: Enable R1 format for reasoning models that support extended thinking capabilities

openAiUseAzure.description: Use Azure OpenAI Service instead of standard OpenAI API

azureApiVersion.description: Azure OpenAI API version (e.g., '2024-02-15-preview'). Required when openAiUseAzure is true

openAiStreamingEnabled.description: Enable streaming responses for real-time token generation

openAiHeaders.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in OpenAI API requests

litellmUsePromptCache.description: Enable prompt caching to reduce costs and improve performance for repeated prompts

deepInfraBaseUrl.description: Custom base URL for DeepInfra API requests

profiles.description: Array of provider profiles for quota fallback

ovhCloudAiEndpointsBaseUrl.description: Custom base URL for OVHcloud AI Endpoints API requests
